string.value: I lost the #t1912000# that I received from #b#p2060005##k! What should I do? Hmmm... maybe I should go see #p2060005#. I hope he's nice enough to give me another one!

#p2060005# says that making a #t1912000# for monster riding requires special ingredients. He needs #b200#t4000171#, 200 #t4000030#, 200 #t4000055##k. #p2060005# says he will also need #b5 million mesos#k for "research purposes". I believe this is otherwise known as "extortion". He's probably a bit upset at me for losing the first one. Oh well, looks like I've got some work to do...\n\n#i4000171##t4000171# #b#c4000171#/200#

I returned to #p2060005# with the proper materials and the 5 million meso extortion--I mean "Research Fee". In return for my efforts, I received #t1912000# from #p2060005#. I should be able ride monsters again with this. I'll be sure not to lose it again!
어라? 전에 몬스터 라이딩 스킬을 익히신 분 아니세요? 그런데 왜 몬스터는 안 타고... 여긴 어쩐 일이시죠? 네에? #t1912000#을 잃어버리셨다고요?
이런! 몬스터와의 공존을 실현시킬 분이라고 생각해서 #t1912000#을 드렸는데, 그것을 잃어버리다니... 휴우. 하는 수 없죠. 다시 #b#t1912000##k을 만들어 드리도록 할게요.
하지만, 이번에는 #t1912000#을 만드는 재료를 모두 구해 오셔야 해요. 재료는 #b#t4000171# 200개, #t4000030# 200개, #t4000055# 200개#k에요. 많다고요? 물론 많지요. 몬스터의 거친 등에 얹힐 물건이니까요!
아, 이번에는 재료만으로는 안 돼요! #t1912000#을 만드는 동안 연구를 못 하게 되니, 그 만큼의 보상도 해 주셔야지요. 연구 지원금 #b500만 메소#k도 가죽과 함께 가져 오세요. 과하다고 하셔도 소용 없어요. 이 정도는 해야 다시는 #t1912000#을 안 잃어버리실 테니까요!
싫으신가요? 그렇다면 하는 수 없죠. 당신께 몬스터 라이딩 스킬을 가르쳐 드린 것이 조금 후회되네요
Aren't you the one who learned the monster riding skill from me? Why didn't you get on the monster? Did you lose #t1912000#?

You're kidding, right? I gave you #t1912000# because I believe that humans and monsters can live in peace together. You lost it...Sigh. I know what to do. I'll make another #b#t1912000##k for you, but you'll have to do some work!

You'll have to gather all the ingredients to make #t1912000#. They are 200 #b#t4000171#, 200#t4000030#, 200#t4000055##k. Sound like a lot? I'll admit the amount seems excessive, but if you want something of high quality, it takes more material. The one I gave you before was one of kind...

Got everything? Excellent! However, I'll need one more thing from you...As I can't do my research while making #t1912000#, you'll have to compensate me for it. I believe #b5 million mesos#k for a replacement sounds reasonable. It may ease your mind to know that you will also help fund further research into human-monster relationships with your donation. Well, should I get started?
You don't want another one? Hmm, I had you pegged as someone who wanted to help spread the idea of monsters and humans living together, apparently I was wrong.
You have all the ingredients and the donation? Great! I'm ready to make #t1912000# for you right now then...let me cut the leather and paste it, and sew it....that's it All done!
Now, #b#t1912000##k is all done. I've made a few modifications to this one, it's a special #t1912000# to protect people from rough hairs of monster. One must be comfortable, after all...
Try not to lose this one--they're hard to make, you know!

You haven't gathered all the ingredients. Remember, I'll need 200#b#t4000171#, 200#t4000030#, 200#t4000055##kl. In addition to that, #b5 million mesos#k. When you have everything, return and I'll make you a new one!
